title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all civil administrative
enforcement proceedings brought by the commission. Whenever the commission
determines, after investigation, that any person has violated ECL, articles 43
and 71, title 33, or rules or regulations promulgated thereunder, or any
permits, certificates or orders issued by the commission, the commission may
proceed as provided herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-4.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
